songs.title: I Was In
songs.lyrics:
MR. LARGE: Congratulations. You work for me now. You’ll obey my rules and regulations. If you do that, you’ll see more money than you can dream of

TARIQ: Okay

MR. LARGE: Tru’ll hook you up with the product you’ll sell. Aight? You’ll get a percent, no money down. Five-O’s on the payroll, so don’t even sweat it. But if you get busted and you rat, you die

TRU: Actually, Mr. Large, he only looking to work for a few days, make some studio money. Yo, he no joke on the mic. He got a meeting this week with the— with the Wu

MR. LARGE: Yo-yo-yo, by the way, did he also tell you I’m a rap manager?

[*demonic organ stabs*]
